channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 忘掉轮廓分明的腹肌吧。匀称的脚趾间距是健身的新趋势，它和六块腹肌一样难以达到。脚趾间距器来了。
item.description:
Forget well-defined abs. Well-spaced toes are the new fitness flex and can be just as hard to attain as a six pack. Enter the toe spacer. https://t.co/eK2LbFNuqc https://t.co/eK2LbFNuqc

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: 欧洲最大航空公司的亿万富翁首席执行官今年有望获得 1 亿多美元的奖金。F 炸弹、出言不逊的笑话和醉醺醺的晚餐都是迈克尔-奥利里的口头禅。
item.description:
The billionaire chief executive of Europe’s biggest airline is on course for a $100 million-plus bonus this year. F-bombs, off-color jokes and drunken dinners are all part of Michael O’Leary's lore. https://t.co/DjdhlReZ5d https://t.co/DjdhlReZ5d

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: 街谈巷议：欧洲军火制造商正在扩张，以填补美国安全野心退却留下的空间
item.description:
Heard on the Street: European arms manufacturers are expanding to fill the space left by retreating U.S. security ambitions https://t.co/5Bh0iKDXxo

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: 加沙地带 100 多万人正在经历类似饥荒的状况。粮食不安全问题专家发现，在这块饱受战争蹂躏的飞地上，有证据表明饥饿现象普遍存在，儿童死亡率急剧上升。
item.description:
More than a million people in the Gaza Strip are experiencing famine-like conditions. Food insecurity experts found evidence of widespread starvation and a sharp increase in child mortality in the war-ravaged enclave. https://t.co/tuwhBnBuQk https://t.co/tuwhBnBuQk

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: 你的副业是生意还是爱好？对于国税局来说，这两者之间的区别很重要，这也是这位初出茅庐的言情小说家所了解到的。
item.description:
Is your side hustle a business or a hobby? The difference matters to the IRS, as this debut romance novelist has learned. https://t.co/nlPdp8sJPv https://t.co/nlPdp8sJPv

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: 美国一直在推动肩扛式导弹和无人机，作为台湾抵御入侵的低成本防御手段。台北必须考虑是否需要更多的坦克和喷气式战斗机。
item.description:
Shoulder-fired missiles and drones have been pushed by the U.S. as a less-expensive defense for Taiwan against invasion. Taipei must work out if it needs more tanks and jet fighters in the mix. https://t.co/fmnrZGZiA3 https://t.co/fmnrZGZiA3

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: 唐-莱蒙公布了他与埃隆-马斯克的访谈内容，他声称是这次访谈导致这位亿万富翁取消了莱蒙与 X 公司的合作，并称他不知道出了什么问题。
item.description:
Don Lemon released the interview with Elon Musk that he alleged led the billionaire to cancel Lemon’s deal with X, saying he didn’t know what had gone wrong https://t.co/lmn48V8EGK https://t.co/lmn48V8EGK

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）最资深的高管之一斯蒂芬妮-科恩（Stephanie Cohen）加入了华尔街顶尖女性人才外流的行列。
item.description:
Stephanie Cohen, one of the most senior executives at Goldman Sachs, is joining an exodus of top female talent from the Wall Street firm https://t.co/3hGIvCRcwY https://t.co/3hGIvCRcwY

item.title: 麦肯锡、波士顿咨询公司（BCG）和德勤（Deloitte）等老牌大型咨询公司受雇为全球最大的企业预测未来，但它们却弄错了自己的命运--其后果是一团糟
item.description:
Big and established consulting firms such as McKinsey, BCG and Deloitte, which are paid to predict the future for the world’s biggest corporations, have gotten their own destiny wrong—and the fallout is messy https://t.co/sXXd0i2Ay8 https://t.co/sXXd0i2Ay8

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: "我太年轻了，不适合变老"。人们不遗余力地减少或阻止白发苍苍的过程。一些研究衰老问题的科学家认为，他们可能有所发现。
item.description:
“I’m too young to be old.” People are going to great lengths to reduce or halt the graying process. Some scientists of aging think they might be onto something. https://t.co/D6sOgGf5BH https://t.co/D6sOgGf5BH

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: 在大流行病初期需求激增后，织物和手工艺品零售商的消费回落，拖累了 Joann 申请破产
item.description:
Joann filed for bankruptcy, weighed down by a consumer pullback at the fabric and craft retailer after a surge in demand early in the pandemic https://t.co/VdSJpjkxOV https://t.co/VdSJpjkxOV

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: 预计到 2024 年，美国的 IT 就业市场将再缩减 20,000 到 30,000 个职位，而人工智能将加速部分技术工作的自动化进程
item.description:
The IT job market in the U.S. is expected to shrink by another 20,000 to 30,000 jobs in 2024, while AI accelerates the automation of some tech jobs https://t.co/sK6lDnm5EB https://t.co/sK6lDnm5EB

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: 街谈巷议Ozempic 无法做到面面俱到。一部潜在的新大片提醒了我们这一点。

item.title: 17 年后，长滩州立大学和教练丹-蒙森（Dan Monson）同意分道扬镳。然后，他同意继续执教，并率领他的球队不出意外地进入了 NCAA 锦标赛。
item.description:
After 17 years, Long Beach State and coach Dan Monson agreed to part ways. Then he agreed to finish out the campaign—and led his team to an improbable NCAA tournament bid. https://t.co/fGLfMBi9Ko https://t.co/fGLfMBi9Ko

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: 街谈巷议日本负利率的终结将是一场缓慢移动的海啸，其长期影响可能是深远的
item.description:
Heard on the Street: The end of negative rates in Japan will be a slow-moving tsunami, with long-term effects that could be profound https://t.co/eCcNVHVqyD https://t.co/eCcNVHVqyD

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: 继上周末巴基斯坦境内发生多起袭击事件后，巴基斯坦对邻国阿富汗进行了空袭，当局将这些袭击事件归咎于边境另一侧的武装分子。
item.description:
Pakistan carried out airstrikes in neighboring Afghanistan, following a weekend of attacks inside Pakistan which the authorities blame on militants based across the border https://t.co/SDHMiFr8i4 https://t.co/SDHMiFr8i4

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: 联邦快递和亚马逊曾探讨过开展更多业务，去年还讨论过联邦快递在其零售点接受亚马逊包裹退货的问题，但并未达成协议。
item.description:
FedEx and https://t.co/KUZV6DVpXq have explored doing more business with each other, last year discussing FedEx accepting Amazon package returns at its retail locations—but didn’t reach a deal https://t.co/DjJGz51mud https://t.co/DjJGz51mud

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: 本周晚些时候，Reddit 将在股票市场首次亮相，Reddit 用户将有机会在这个社交媒体平台上分一杯羹。
item.description:
Reddit users are getting the unusual opportunity to own a slice of the social-media platform in its stock-market debut later this week https://t.co/YG5pyD5gMM https://t.co/YG5pyD5gMM

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: 语言学家 Anne Curzan 写道："Irregardless"（不管不顾）触动了人们内心深处对语言的一些感受，但它实际上是一个词
item.description:
“Irregardless” taps into some deep-seated feelings about language, but it is, in fact, a word, writes linguist Anne Curzan https://t.co/PDnVdO4exq https://t.co/PDnVdO4exq

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: 谷歌 Podcasts 应用程序将于 4 月 2 日后停止让听众收听播客。以下是安卓用户继续收听《华尔街日报》播客的其他方法
item.description:
The Google Podcasts app is set to stop letting listeners hear podcasts after April 2. Here are other ways for Android users to continue hearing WSJ podcasts https://t.co/SsC633hCkU https://t.co/SsC633hCkU

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: 由于食品价格不断上涨，在苹果蜂餐厅（Applebee's）晚餐约会是美国餐饮业最热门的门票之一。但是，一张价值 1500 美元的餐厅每周用餐的稀有通行证，却让厌倦了通货膨胀的食客们一见倾心。
item.description:
A dinner date at Applebee's is one of the hottest tickets in American dining, thanks to escalating food prices. But a rare pass for $1,500 worth of weekly meals at the restaurant became an instant hit for inflation-weary diners. https://t.co/2ZsnAoE2F9 https://t.co/2ZsnAoE2F9

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024
